name: bg-replace
description: Background replacement web application with Python ML backend

scripts.install:all: npm run install:system && npm run install:venv && npm run install:pytorch && npm run install:core && npm run install:dlib && npm run install:detectron2
scripts.install:system: sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y python3 python3-venv python3-pip git cmake build-essential libatlas-base-dev libgtk-3-dev libopencv-dev ffmpeg
scripts.install:venv: python3 -m venv bust_env && echo 'Virtual environment created. Activate with: source bust_env/bin/activate'
scripts.install:pytorch: bash -c 'source bust_env/bin/activate && pip install --upgrade pip && pip install torch torchvision torchaudio --index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu'
scripts.install:core: bash -c 'source bust_env/bin/activate && pip install opencv-python mediapipe rembg[cpu] numpy pillow'
scripts.install:detectron2: bash -c 'source bust_env/bin/activate && git clone https://github.com/facebookresearch/detectron2.git && cd detectron2 && pip install --no-build-isolation -e . && cd ..'
scripts.dev:backend: bash -c 'source bust_env/bin/activate && cd backend && python app.py'
scripts.test:bg:random: bash -c 'RANDOM_IMG=$(find ./data/img_align_celeba -name "*.jpg" -type f | shuf -n 1) && echo "Selected: $(basename "$RANDOM_IMG")" && cp "$RANDOM_IMG" ./mugshot1.png && npm run test:bg'
scripts.view:edges: bash -c 'python3 -m http.server 8080 &> /dev/null & sleep 1 && echo "Opening http://localhost:8080/edge_viewer.html" && xdg-open http://localhost:8080/edge_viewer.html 2>/dev/null || open http://localhost:8080/edge_viewer.html 2>/dev/null || echo "Open http://localhost:8080/edge_viewer.html in your browser"'
